member.name: T:PhoneBook.Core.TelephoneProcessor
member.summary: Remove punctuation on input and insert punctuation on output.

remarks.p: Null input or output is passed thorugh as null. Non-null input or output must be strings. Output is formatted for local or long distane US telephone numbers. Output strings that are too short or too long are passed through.
